fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Trap**: Play a special Trap! (34), anyone who triggers it will take a Basic attack, You will learn who got trapped. (2 uses)
- **Disarm**: Choose a player. Permanently steal all of their attacking abilities and add a copy of all abilities taken to your hand as a 1-use card. (1 use).
- **Defenseless**: Choose a player. Permanently steal all of their defensive abilities and add a copy of all abilities taken to your hand as a 1-use card. (1 use)
- **Chase**: If you have attacked someone and they survived in the previous night, Upgrade your attack cards played against them this night. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- **Toughness**: The first time you start a night at 3 HP or less, you automatically heal yourself to full HP.
- **Refund**: If you die, all abilities stolen by your abilities will be given back.
